mapper.select:
select vi.id, vi.vehicle_code, vi.merchant_id, vi.vehicle_no, vi.fuel_type, vi.operation_state, vi.create_date, vi.vehicle_brand, vi.content, vi.images, vi.vehicle_color, vi.name, vi.engine_no, vi.emission_standard, vi.vehicle_type, mi.name as merchantName, mi.principal, mi.phone as merchantPhone, mi.address from vehicle_info vi left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = vi.merchant_id) where 1 = 1
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vehicleInfo.merchantName},'%')
AND vi.vehicle_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vehicleInfo.vehicleNo},'%')
AND mi.user_id = #{vehicleInfo.merchantId}
order by vi.create_date desc
